story_parts.text: Once upon a time, a lion went to the city. He was very excited to see all the tall buildings and busy people. However, he soon realized that the city was not very friendly to animals. He was chased by a dog and had to run away. He was also scared by the loud noise of the cars. In the end, the lion decided that the city was not for him and went back to the jungle.
